title: Smegman
author: Smegman
content: Hello Everyone,Welcome to the easiest autopilot income you will ever seeWith our service you will get a silent crypto miner and a management web panel completely setup and ready for you to useAll you need to do is install your miner on as many windows machines that you like and watch the crypto roll in !Starting At $25 for the first 5 customersto purchase contact me on telegram https://t.me/UKBurners

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: I don't understand, are you offering cryptocurrency mining software or equipment?

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on October 19, 2022, 07:04:19 PMI don't understand, are you offering cryptocurrency mining software or equipment?From how it is phrased it, it sounds more like he is selling a cryptojacking software!You can get mining software for free so it doesn't make sense to pay 25$ to a stranger for some software that might only clean up your wallet and that's all.Plus that name, "burners", also tells quite a bit about who you're dealing with.Quote from: Smegman on October 19, 2022, 06:30:01 PMWelcome to the easiest autopilot income you will ever seeSo all I have to do is to install this on my old P4 and I can watch real-time bitcoins after bitcoins roll in my wallet, or do I have to wait 4 years before I make 10 cents?

comments.author: Smegman
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on October 19, 2022, 07:04:19 PMI don't understand, are you offering cryptocurrency mining software or equipment?its software and a webpanel hosted by us  - the software will build your miner with your chosen settings, and the panel will show the machines you have it running on and stats for each machine.all you do is run the miner on pcs you wish to use and your mining your chosen crypto. Running it on more PCs will mine more crypto. hope this explains it a little better

comments.author: Smegman
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on October 19, 2022, 07:19:31 PMQuote from: r_victory on October 19, 2022, 07:04:19 PMI don't understand, are you offering cryptocurrency mining software or equipment?From how it is phrased it, it sounds more like he is selling a cryptojacking software!You can get mining software for free so it doesn't make sense to pay 25$ to a stranger for some software that might only clean up your wallet and that's all.Plus that name, "burners", also tells quite a bit about who you're dealing with.Quote from: Smegman on October 19, 2022, 06:30:01 PMWelcome to the easiest autopilot income you will ever seeSo all I have to do is to install this on my old P4 and I can watch real-time bitcoins after bitcoins roll in my wallet, or do I have to wait 4 years before I make 10 cents?  not at all and thanks for ripping my thread ,  its exactly what the thread explains , a silent crypto miner. For example if you had just one machine with an Intel  i9-10900K CPU @ 3.70GHz  The Hash rate for mining Monero (XMR) would be   5145.04 H/s = 0.02535993 XMR  which is around  3.19 USD  per month from just one PC .XMR is not the most profitable coin to mine right now this is just an example i have on hand .

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Smegman on October 19, 2022, 07:54:39 PMFor example if you had just one machine with an Intel  i9-10900K CPU @ 3.70GHz  The Hash rate for mining Monero (XMR) would be   5145.04 H/s = 0.02535993 XMR  which is around  3.19 USD  per month from just one PC .Nice, in theory, but you failed to mention two things to your possible customers:One, that the CPU was worth $400, so about 130 months or 11 years of mining.Second, the same CPU is rated 125W, which means 3Kwh a day while full-throttled (to reach that hashrate), thats 100Kwh a month, so if you pay more than 3 cents per kwh you're losing money.
